abstract: Officials want to inspect a hard drive from one of Google’s roving vehicles used to compile its Street View photo mapping archive.
snippet: Officials want to inspect a hard drive from one of Google’s roving vehicles used to compile its Street View photo mapping archive.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN — Prosecutors in Hamburg opened a criminal investigation of Google on Wednesday over its collecting of private Internet data from unsecured Wi-Fi networks in Germany.

headline.print_headline: In Germany, a Criminal Inquiry Is Opened on Google’s Data-Gathering
